snippet: Reduced oil production and other factors contributed to a stressed economy likely to exert new pressure on the rial, Iran’s currency, according to the International Energy Agency.
abstract: International Energy Agency releases data showing Iran's daily oil production,  most important component of its economy, fell in September to its weakest level in nearly a quarter-century; this and other factors contribute to a stressed economy that is likely to exert new pressure on the rial, Iran’s currency.
lead_paragraph: Reduced oil production and other factors contributed to a stressed economy likely to exert new pressure on the rial, Iran’s currency, according to the International Energy Agency.

headline.main: Data on Iran Dims Outlook for Economy
headline.print_headline: Data on Iran Dims Outlook For Economy
